top_stories.title: OpenAI and Broadcom partner on AI hardware
top_stories.description: OpenAI will purchase 10 gigawatts' worth of AI accelerator hardware from semiconductor Broadcom.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Szkutak
top_stories.content: OpenAI will purchase 10 gigawatts' worth of AI accelerator hardware from semiconductor Broadcom.

top_stories.title: Responsible AI: How PowerSchool safeguards millions of students with AI-powered content filtering using Amazon SageMaker AI
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how PowerSchool built and deployed a custom content filtering solution using Amazon SageMaker AI that achieved better accuracy while maintaining low false positive rates. We walk through our technical approach to fine tuning Llama 3.1 8B, our deployment architecture, and the performance results from internal validations.
top_stories.author: Anjali Vijayakumar
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how PowerSchool built and deployed a custom content filtering solution using Amazon SageMaker AI that achieved better accuracy while maintaining low false positive rates. We walk through our technical approach to fine tuning Llama 3.1 8B, our deployment architecture, and the performance results from internal validations.

top_stories.title: Relace wants to build the infrastructure foundation for AI coding agents after raising $23M in funding
top_stories.description: Artificial intelligence coding infrastructure startup Relace today announced it has closed on $23 million in early-stage funding. The Series A round was led by one of Silicon Valley’s most prestigious venture capital firms, Andreessen Horowitz, and saw participation from Matrix Partners and Y Combinator. The startup, which is officially known as Squack Inc., is building […] The post Relace wants to build the infrastructure foundation for AI coding agents after raising $23M in funding appeared...

top_stories.title: Make agents a reality with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore: Now generally available

top_stories.title: AI sales automation startup AnyTeam gets $10M backing from 40+ investors
top_stories.description: Artificial intelligence sales startup AnyTeam Inc. said today it’s launching its platform in early access after closing on a $10 million seed funding round that attracted interest from numerous investors. The round was led by SignalFire and saw participation from Crosslink Capital and a long list of more than 40 individual angel investors, including executives […] The post AI sales automation startup AnyTeam gets $10M backing from 40+ investors appeared first on SiliconANGLE.
